predicate.note: Frames file for 'sidle' based on frames file for 'stroll'.

role.descr: agent, rider (use only if arg1 is present)

example.name: Old West?
example.text: Wyatt sidled his horse up to Annie's side.

example.name: Disney sense
example.text: Out past the strip malls and tract housing of western Palm Beach County, the lions have sidled up to tourists in sturdy cars since Disney World was still a figment.
